page.title: 19A Typical Day at School
page.content: When we come in at 09.00 we have workshop, where we do all sorts of art work. Then at 10.15 we have playtime. At 10.30 we come in and have assembly. Classes come in and listen to the Headmaster, or have children show some work they have done. Then we come in and do some S.M.P. maths with the equipment. Dinner time is at 12.00 At 13.00 we come in and read. Then we do some writing like a story or handwriting. At 14.15 we have playtime and after play we have rounders. PLAYTIME - We have two 15 minute playtimes in a day. At playtime the boys often play football and the girls play a game with a long piece of elastic. Before we come in the teacher on duty blows the whistle and all the classes line up to go into school.
